Since AB=I, B has full rank (proof ez).

Our goal is to show BA=I.
Notice that B=BI = BAB.
So BABx=Bx for all x in F^n.

As B is a n by n matrix with full rank, every vector y in F^n can be written as y= Bx.

Thus, BABx=Bx
=>BAy=y for all y in F^n
=> BAy=Iy
=> BA=I.
